## Add `+` [esql-add]

:::{image} ../../../images/operators/add.svg
:alt: Embedded
:class: text-center
:::

Add two numbers together. If either field is [multivalued](/reference/query-languages/esql/esql-multivalued-fields.md) then the result is `null`.



:::{include} ../types/add.md
:::
